project.title: Personal Portfolio Template
project.tagline: Responsive, elegant, and beautiful HTML Template
project.about: Responsive, elegant, and beautiful personal portfolio HTML template.
features: Responsive built with Bootstrap 4 and jQuery
Lazy load images to increase page load speed
Compatible with all browsers and beautiful user interface
project.description: Far far away, behind the word mountains, far from the countries Vokalia and Consonantia, there live the blind texts. Separated they live in Bookmarksgrove right at the coast of the Semantics, a large language ocean.
